mapper.delete: delete from admin_card_bind where physical_cardno = #{cardNo} and usercode = #{usercode}
mapper.select: SELECT a.usercode, a.username, a.tel, a.resideaddress as address, c.isalive, c.physical_cardno AS cardNo, c.createtime, CASE c.cardkind WHEN 1 THEN 'IC卡' WHEN 2 THEN 'CPU卡' WHEN 3 THEN '深圳通卡' END cardkind, CASE c.isalive WHEN 0 THEN '注销' WHEN 1 THEN '有效' WHEN 2 THEN '发卡' WHEN 3 THEN '禁用' WHEN 4 THEN '黑名单' END cardStatus, CASE a.landlordtype WHEN 0 THEN "未知" WHEN 1 THEN "原房东" WHEN 2 THEN "管理员" WHEN 3 THEN "房东家属" WHEN 4 THEN "网格员" WHEN 5 THEN "警务人员" WHEN 6 THEN "治安科" WHEN 72 THEN "保洁人员" WHEN 8 THEN "代管" WHEN 9 THEN "维修人员" WHEN 10 THEN "申报义务人" WHEN 11 THEN "送气人员" WHEN 12 THEN "集成单位" END adminType FROM base_landlord a, admin_card_bind c WHERE c.usercode = a.usercode AND cardtype = 2 AND build_code = #{buildcode}
